name: The Last Alchemist (Stargate18)
description:
Explore the world, as you collect powerful books and search for the truth behind the disappearance of alchemy.

  • 150 books to collect.
  • 16 areas to explore.
  • 40 potions to create.
  • Multiple puzzles to solve.
  • Work with low information and determine mechanics yourself.
  • Almost no balancing, due to a lack of time.
  • Please be kind enjoy!

If there are any problems, let me know.
